search.placeholder: Search for movies or TV shows...

media.veryLargeSeriesWarning: Very large series - may take significant time to download

requestsWarning.title: Warning:
requestsWarning.missingIds: {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} missing external IDs and won't appear in Sonarr/Radarr feeds.
requestsWarning.missingImdb: Missing IMDB ID - will not appear in Radarr feed
requestsWarning.missingTvdb: Missing TVDB ID - will not appear in Sonarr feed

removeModal.title: Remove Request?
removeModal.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove {title} from your requests?

feedModal.title: Feed URLs for Sonarr/Radarr
feedModal.tokenRequired: Feed token is required. URLs include the token parameter.

pushModal.enableDescription: Get notified when your requested movies and TV shows are added to the library.
pushModal.disableDescription: You will no longer receive push notifications when your requests are added to the library.
pushModal.blocked: Notifications are blocked. Enable in browser settings.

pwaModal.title: Enable Notifications
pwaModal.description: To receive push notifications on iOS, you need to install this app to your home screen.
pwaModal.step3: Open the app from your home screen
pwaModal.step4: Tap the bell icon to enable notifications
